services.</ows:Abstract> <ows:Metadata xlink:href="http://ndp.opendap:8080/opendap/coverage/200803061600_HFRadar_USEGC_6km_rtv_SIO.nc.das"/> <ows:WGS84BoundingBox> <ows:LowerCorner>-97.8839 21.736</ows:LowerCorner> <ows:UpperCorner>-57.2312 46.4944</ows:UpperCorner> </ows:WGS84BoundingBox> <Identifier>coverage/200803061600_HFRadar_USEGC_6km_rtv_SIO.nc</Identifier> </CoverageSummary>
